title: Nadhi Vellam Lyrics Thanga Meengal Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Nadhi Vellam
Singer: Rahul Nambiyar
Movie: Thanga Meengal
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar		 Other Songs
Anadha Yazhai
Nadhi Vellam
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Nadhi vellam mele, en meeney meeney
nee neendhiya , pon ninaivugal
nenjil nizhazhaadum.
Mun andhi nizhavil en maaney maaney
nee odiya men suvadugal
meendum unnai ketkum.

En kannin iru karu vizhigal
un mugathai thaedudhadi
kanneer thuligal kaatchiyayai
maraikudhadi

En kaatil oru mazhai vandhadhu
andha eerangal kaayum munney
idi minnal vizhundhu
kaadey erindhadhadi

Nadhi vellam mele, en meeney meeney
nee neendhiya , pon ninaivugal
nenjil nizhazhaadum.
Mun andhi nizhavil en maaney maaney
nee odiya men suvadugal
meendum unnai ketkum.

Alayindhidum megam pola
indha vazhkaye,
Kaatrin valiyil pogindrom
kalaindhidum kolam endra podhilum
vasalil vannam vidhaikindrom

Uyire unnai pirindhen
udaney naanum irandhaen
udal naan angu vazhum nee naaney
endhan uyire ..

Nadhi vellam mele, en meeney meeney
nee neendhiya , pon ninaivugal
nenjil nizhazhaadum.
Mun andhi nizhavil en maaney maaney
nee odiya men suvadugal
meendum unnai ketkum.

Malar ondru veelindhaal
palar oduvaar
ilaigal veelndhaal sarugaagum
valiyavan vazhkai ilai adhu
endra podhilum
sarugugal orunaal uramaagum

Uyire unnai pirindhen
udaney naanum irandhaen
udal naan angu vazhum nee naaney
endhan uyire ..

Nadhi vellam mele, en meeney meeney
nee neendhiya , pon ninaivugal
nenjil nizhazhaadum.
Mun andhi nizhavil en maaney maaney
nee odiya men suvadugal
meendum unnai ketkum.
